about.karamMission:
We believe food is a language of generosity and love. Through Karam El Sham, we aim to: 
Serve authentic Syrian dishes with a modern touch 
 Use fresh, high-quality ingredients 
 Provide fast, friendly, and efficient service 
 Expand sustainably while staying true to our roots
about.karamStory:
Karam El Sham is not just a restaurant – it’s a journey into the heart of Damascus, served right here in Egypt.
 Since 2018, we’ve been crafting authentic Syrian meals with real flavor, generous portions, and the warm spirit of Shamy hospitality. 
 From our signature shawarma to our cozy atmosphere, every detail is designed to bring people together over unforgettable food.
about.karamValues:
Generosity – In taste, quantity, and attitude
 Authenticity – Preserving our original Syrian recipes 
 Innovation – Always improving the customer experience 
 Respect – For time, taste, and trust 
 Quality – In every bite, every branch, every moment
about.karamVision: To become the leading destination in Egypt and the Middle East for authentic Syrian cuisine, through consistent quality, exceptional service, and wide-reaching presence.
about.para: With over 15 branches across Egypt, Karam El Sham stands as the most trusted and loved Syrian food chain in the country – a brand built on flavor, culture, and the spirit of home.
